name: 7 DEEPS (ARDSKAPE)
description:
6 kids, participants of Summer Imagination Camp (SIC), tell campfire legends in the deeps of woods. These legends're intertwined: resound with hard childhood issues, fairytaling the reality and... the existence of the 7th - another kid, or possibly an outworld-ish creature, who was the first, they thought, to get lost in the deeps of Scottish woods that enveloped the secret lake Louch Angler.   

Kids one by one get fished into these deeps after the 7th. 

_________

USEFUL TIPS

Played best/tested at 1920x1080 (16:9 ratio).

Controls (overall) - Space/Enter, Mouse (LMC)

Controls (platformer) - WASD + Space + LMC

Hold and empower. Please, be patient: take slow pace and don't get erratic with Spaces or Clicks, for the scenes may take some time to load.

Game is auto-saved (once per game session).

Some scenes allow to Quit (press F10).

However we encourage you to play through at once, for the best deep taste of the whole story.

If, at some point, you got stuck or willing to start from somewhere you can't get to anymore (for some reason), please, address us, we shall provide you with a hint to get there.  

If textures assaulted you or the game froze, try the previous scene (from the Menu) or Restart (game starts from the beginning).

Also see if the game starts from the Black screen with Red text in the Top Left corner. That's the starting scene. Otherwise, please, use Menu/Restart. 

P.S.

This is our first real game (not a jam).

P.P.S.

Now we do get the coding part, yay!
